2.text: Twist the leaves off the top of the pineapple.

3.text: Strip off some of the lower leaves to expose the stem.

4.text: Turn it upside down and let it dry for a week.

5.text: Fill a large glass with water.

6.text: Stick a few toothpicks into the pineapple crown.

7.text: Put the crown in the water.

8.text: Place the glass in a sunny window and wait for the roots to sprout.

9.text: Prepare a pot of soil for the crown.

10.text: Plant the pineapple crown in the pot.

11.text: Keep the plant moist and warm.

12.text: Give the plant food and water.
